text: @AshleyRParker It’s a wee bit to late, don’t you think? The United States with 4 percent of the world’s population bear a quarter of the world’s deaths.  And, to top it off, we may have 200,000, or more Covid-19 deaths in America by Election Day.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
